thread.title: ISC badminton tournament: Bharati Ramachandran claims women’s singles title
thread.title_full: ISC badminton tournament: Bharati Ramachandran claims women’s singles title

author: muscatdaily@apexmedia.co.om (Muscat Daily News)
title: ISC badminton tournament: Bharati Ramachandran claims women’s singles title
text:
ISC badminton tournament: Bharati Ramachandran claims women’s singles title October 14, 2015 
Bharati Ramachandran rode good form to claim the women’s open singles title, defeating Mayaja Harish in the final of the annual badminton tournament. 
In men's A doubles semifinals, Cyril Williams and Sudheer combined well to beat Ronnie Pereira and Kennedy 21-10, 21-12. 
In men’s open doubles quarterfinals, Dipu and Geemon faced stiff resistance before defeating Percy Pereira and P T Francis 17-21, 21-19, 27-25. 
In men’s A singles, Bishen Singh Bhalla stormed into final, defeating Niyas N 18-21, 21-12, 21-12 in their semifinal. 
In the mixed doubles semifinals, Ashutosh Pant and Sailee Kerkar claimed victory over Leon D’Souza and Ashpruha 21-19, 21-16; while Francis and Bharati beat Percy Pereira and Nishita Karnik 21-18, 18-21, 22-20. 
Earlier, in the men’s doubles open semifinals, Cyril Williams and Sudheer Raghavan overpowered Sharat Kumar and Sajan 17-21, 21-17, 21-17. 
In the U18 boys' singles final earlier in the week, Jay Deshpande got the better of Leon D’Souza 21-15, 21-18 to take the title. Similar content
